reviewQuestionAnswesViews.QuestionText: Is the salary as per market standard?
Tell us about your last increment
How many hours you normally work in a day?
Does WNS (Holdings) Ltd have a flexible working hours policy?
How often do you have parties/offsites?

answersView.AnswerTextHi: प्रबंधन इस पर विश्वास नहीं करता है

reviewQuestionAnswesViews.QuestionText: How often do employees get promotions?
How many trainings do you attend every year?

answersView.AnswerText: More than 6 times in a year
answersView.AnswerTextHi: एक वर्ष में 6 बार से अधिक

detailedDescription.articleBody: WNS Global is a global business process management company headquartered in Mumbai, India. It has 41,466 personnel working in 61 "delivery centers" across the world, including China, Costa Rica, India, the Philippines, Poland, Romania, South Africa, Spain, Sri Lanka, Turkey, the United Kingdom, and the United States.
detailedDescription.articleBodyHi: डब्ल्यूएनएस ग्लोबल एक वैश्विक व्यापार प्रक्रिया प्रबंधन कंपनी है जिसका मुख्यालय मुंबई, भारत में है, इसमें चीन, कोस्टा रिका, भारत, फिलीपींस, पोलैंड, रोमानिया, दक्षिण अफ्रीका, स्पेन सहित दुनिया भर के 61 \
